TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MembershipUser extends System.Object

summary.span: 公开和更新成员资格数据存储中的成员资格用户信息。

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information in the membership data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象用于表示成员资格数据存储区中的单个成员身份用户。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the membership data store. 它公开有关的电子邮件地址，例如成员资格用户的信息，并提供成员资格用户，例如可以更改或重置他或她的密码的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[简介成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). A会返回对象和方法或作为的一部分返回， ，和方法。A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. A对象所需的方法如果你想要更新现有的成员资格用户的信息。A object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将更新用户的电子邮件地址。The following code example updates the email address for a user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/UpdateEmailcs.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/UpdateEmailvb.aspx#11)]

summary.span: 使用指定的属性值创建新的成员资格用户对象。

span.span: Creates a new membership user object with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新对象不会向成员资格数据存储区中添加新的成员资格用户对象。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要将新的成员资格用户添加到成员资格数据存储区中，使用方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 请注意，方法返回成员资格用户添加到数据存储的对象。Note that the method returns a object for the membership user added to the data store. 可以在与一起使用的应用程序代码中构造对象方法。 objects can be constructed in application code for use with the method. 或者，你还可以传递从返回的对象， ， ， ，或方法以及方法。Alternatively, you can also pass a object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 对象通常也通过成员资格提供程序实现构造， ， ， ，和方法。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership-provider implementations for the , , , , and methods. `name`， `email`，和`passwordQuestion`参数都要进行调整在使用前。The `name`, `email`, and `passwordQuestion` parameters are all trimmed before being used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现成员资格提供程序的方法。The following code example shows an implementation of the method for a membership provider. 该方法构造时用户已成功添加到数据存储区返回的对象。The method constructs a object that is returned when the user is successfully added to the data store. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor/CS/newuser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor/VB/newuser.vb#1)]

span.span: Updates the password for the membership user in the membership data store.

returns.span: 如果更新操作成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the update was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性来更新成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to update the password for the membership user in the membership data store. 成员资格提供程序可能有密码的大小限制。The membership provider may have restrictions on the size of the password. 有关大小限制，请参阅成员资格提供程序的文档。For size limitations, see the documentation for the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将修改当前登录的用户的密码。The following code example modifies the password for the current logged-on user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性来更新密码提示问题和答案成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to update the password question and answer for the membership user in the membership data store. 成员资格提供程序可能会带来的密码提示问题和答案的大小限制。The membership provider may have restrictions on the size of the password question and answer. 有关大小限制，请参阅成员资格提供程序的文档。For size limitations, see the documentation for the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例更新密码提示问题和当前登录的用户提示问题答案。The following code example updates the password question and answer for the current logged-on user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: Application-specific information for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于存储特定于应用程序的成员资格用户的自定义信息。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 可以存储在的信息的量属性由引用的成员资格提供程序定义属性。The amount of information that can be stored in the property for a is defined by the membership provider referenced by the property. 如果你的应用程序需要更多空间来存储用户信息大于所允许的成员资格提供程序，你可以实现自定义成员资格提供程序，或使用用户。If your application requires more space to store user information than is allowed by the membership provider, you can implement a custom membership provider, or use the user .

summary.span: 从成员资格数据存储中获取成员资格用户的密码。

span.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.
The password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性从成员资格数据存储中检索的成员身份的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership from the membership data store. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供程序支持使用密码的，你将无法检索成员资格用户的密码，以及应考虑进行的使用用户忘记其密码的方法。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > A将会引发`enablePasswordRetrieval`设置为`true`和`passwordFormat`设置为`Hashed`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果是`true`，必须使用重载采用密码回答作为参数并提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法来检索指定的用户名的密码。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name. 密码发送到用户的电子邮件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. 请注意，被假定为`false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!NOTE] > 对于需要高的安全级别的站点不建议以使用电子邮件的明文形式返回的密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全站点，建议你返回使用加密，如 SSL 的密码。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepassword2cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepassword2vb.aspx#3)]

span.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.
The password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性，以从成员资格数据存储区检索成员资格用户的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership user from the membership data store. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供程序支持使用密码的，你将无法检索成员资格用户的密码，以及应考虑进行的使用用户忘记其密码的方法。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > A将会引发`enablePasswordRetrieval`设置为`true`和`passwordFormat`设置为`Hashed`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果是`false`，你可以提供`null`为`answer`参数或使用不采用任何参数的重载。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法来检索指定的用户名的密码，如果在正确的密码答案。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name if the correct password answer is supplied. 密码发送到用户的电子邮件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. > [!NOTE] > 对于需要高的安全级别的站点不建议以使用电子邮件的明文形式返回的密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全站点，建议你返回使用加密，如 SSL 的密码。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepasswordcs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepasswordvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间对的调用检查成员资格用户的值通过。The value for a membership user is checked during the call to by the . 如果属性设置为`false`、方法返回`false`即使提供的用户名和密码是否正确。If the property is set to `false`, the method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.

span.span: if the membership user is locked out and unable to be validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户通常情况下锁定，并且无法通过验证方法时内到达。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 用户可以也被锁定如果你使用或重载，它接受密码提示问题答案和用户输入的错误答案的次数达到内。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the within the . 若要将此属性设置为`false`，让用户尝试登录同样，你可以使用方法。To set this property to `false` and let the user try to log in again, you can use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果联机认为用户当前日期和时间减去属性值是早于用户。A user is considered online if the current date and time minus the property value is earlier than the for the user. 用户更新为当前日期和时间的，和方法，并可以由某些的重载更新方法。The for a user is updated to the current date and time by the , and methods, and can be updated by some of the overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 用户的属性值更新中的类通过和命名空间从检索到或在数据源中设置用户数据时。The property value for a user is updated by the classes in the and the namespaces whenever user data is retrieved from or set at the data source. 如果你的应用程序使用相同的数据源来存储用户信息和你和具有相同配置`applicationName`作为你，则和将用户的属性反映此行为。If your application uses the same data source to store user information, and your and are configured with the same `applicationName` as your , then the and properties of the user will reflect this behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的所有成员资格用户名控制和标签用于显示特定成员资格信息选定的用户名称，包括成员资格用户的属性值。The following code example displays all membership user names in a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for the selected user name, including the property value for the membership user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户通常能锁定时内到达。Users are most commonly locked out when the is reached within the . 用户可以也被锁定如果你使用或重载，它接受密码提示问题答案和用户输入的错误答案的次数达到内。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the within the . 默认值为属性由成员资格提供程序。The default value for the property is determined by the membership provider. 例如，当成员资格用户使用创建提供程序，用户的属性最初设置为 01/01/1754年。For example, when a membership user is created using the provider, the property for the user is initially set to 01/01/1754.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置， ， ，和将日期转换为同一日期和创建成员资格用户时的时间方法。The sets the , , , and date to the same date and time when a membership user is created by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示登录页，该值指示密码已在指定天数后过期。The following code example shows a login page that indicates a password has expired after a specified number of days. 如果为早于当前日期和时间减去指定的密码，到期的天数，则引导用户进行更改他或她的密码。If the is earlier than the current date and time minus the number of days specified for the expiration of a password, then the user is directed to change his or her password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，则必须向提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案和方法。If is `true`, then the password answer for a membership user must be supplied to the and methods. 用作对成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案他或她的提醒。The serves as a reminder to the membership user of what his or her password answer is. 答案值后成员资格用户已提供密码提示问题答案，可以提供给或方法。Once the membership user has supplied a password answer, the answer value can be supplied to the or method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重置用户的密码，如果他或她提供合适的密码提示问题答案。The following code example resets a user's password if he or she supplies the appropriate password answer. 为用户显示为对用户的密码提示问题答案的提醒。The for the user is displayed as a reminder to the user of the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: The name of the membership provider that stores and retrieves user information for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开的成员资格提供程序管理的信息的名称。The property exposes the name of the membership provider that manages the information for the . 你可以通过访问成员资格用户的特定成员资格提供程序实例属性类，指示是否在提供程序的默认提供程序应用程序。You can access the specific membership provider instance for a membership user by using the property of the class, whether or not the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，你可能创建一个带方法对象作为输入，并更新基于你的业务逻辑。For example, you may create a method that takes a object as input and updates the based on your business logic. 你可以确保适当的成员身份提供程序用于更新通过调用从成员资格提供程序方法按编制索引的集合属性值。You can ensure that the appropriate membership provider is used to update the by calling the method of the membership provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value.

summary.span: 将用户密码重置为自动生成的新密码。

span.span: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.

returns.span: 成员资格用户的新密码。

span.span: The new password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性来重置到一个新的成员资格用户的密码自动生成密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 新密码则返回给调用方。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果是`true`，必须使用重载采用密码回答作为参数并提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重置用户的密码，并返回自动生成的新密码。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. 请注意，被假定为`false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). Public Overridable Function ResetPassword (passwordAnswer As String) As String
public: virtual System::String ^ ResetPassword(System::String ^ passwordAnswer);

param.name: passwordAnswer
param.span: 成员资格用户的密码答案。

span.span: The password answer for the membership user.

summary.span: 将用户密码重置为自动生成的新密码。

span.span: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.

returns.span: 成员资格用户的新密码。

span.span: The new password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性来重置到一个新的成员资格用户的密码自动生成密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 新密码则返回给调用方。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果是`false`，你可以提供`null`为`answer`参数或使用不采用任何参数的重载。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重置用户的密码，并返回自动生成的新密码。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/ResetPasswordcs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/ResetPasswordvb.aspx#5)]

summary.span: 清除用户锁定状态，以便验证成员资格用户。

span.span: Clears the locked-out state of the user so that the membership user can be validated.

returns.span: 如果成功取消成员资格用户的锁定，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户通常情况下锁定，并且无法通过验证方法时内到达。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 用户可以也被锁定如果你使用或重载，它接受密码提示问题答案和用户输入的错误答案的次数达到的值内。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the value of within the . 此方法的实现应设置属性`false`，将其设置属性的当前日期和重置用于跟踪的数的任何计数器失败登录尝试，依此类推。Your implementation of this method should set the property to `false`, set the property to the current date, and reset any counters that you use to track the number of failed log in attempts and so forth.

Public Overridable ReadOnly Property UserName As String

summary.span: 获取成员身份用户的登录名。

span.span: Gets the logon name of the membership user.

value.span: 成员身份用户的登录名。

span.span: The logon name of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员资格用户的与成员资格用户的密码结合使用成员资格用户进行身份验证。A membership user's is used in conjunction with the membership user's password to authenticate the membership user. 的标识每个应用程序使用的唯一用户进行身份验证。The of a identifies a unique user for each application that uses for authentication. 应用程序标识由成员资格。An application is identified by the membership . 可为不同的用户在多个应用程序相同的用户名。The same user name can be used in multiple applications for different users. 或者，单个用户名称用于标识用户的多个应用程序，提供将应用程序配置具有相同。Alternatively, a single user name can be used to identify a user for multiple applications, provided the applications are configured with the same . 你可以检索通过将用户名称传递给其中一个重载的成员资格用户对象方法，或作为的成员从返回， ，或方法。You can retrieve a object for a membership user by passing the user name to one of the overloads of the method, or as a member of a returned from the , , or method. 你可以检索成员资格用户的用户名，如果知道用户的电子邮件地址，通过使用方法。You can retrieve the user name for a membership user if the email address for the user is known, by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将绑定到应用程序中的所有成员资格用户的属性控制，并使用标签以显示选定的用户名称的特定成员资格信息。The following code example binds the property of all the membership users in an application to a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for a selected user name. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/itemcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/itemvb.aspx#2)]
